abstract: nanostring technologies inc given consensus rating of `` hold '' by analysts .
article: shares of nanostring technologies inc have earned an average recommendation of `` hold '' from the seven analysts that are covering the stock , marketbeat . com reports . two equities research analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating , four have issued a hold rating and one has issued a buy rating on the company . the average 12 month price objective among brokerages that have covered the stock in the last year is $ 16.00 . nstg has been the topic of several research analyst reports . robert w. baird dropped their price objective on nanostring technologies from $ 14.00 to $ 12.00 and set an `` outperform '' rating on the stock in a research note on friday , november 3rd .

zacks investment research cut nanostring technologies from a `` hold '' rating to a `` sell '' rating in a research note on tuesday , october 17th . cowen reissued a `` buy '' rating and issued a $ 20.00 price objective on shares of nanostring technologies in a research note on thursday , september 28th . finally , janney montgomery scott cut nanostring technologies from a `` buy '' rating to a `` neutral '' rating in a research note on thursday , october 12th . nanostring technologies opened at $ 7.85 on tuesday . nanostring technologies has a 52 week low of $ 7.03 and a 52 week high of $ 23.25 .

the stock has a market capitalization of $ 199.26 , a p/e ratio of -3.79 and a beta of 0.82 . the company has a quick ratio of 2.89 , a current ratio of 3.35 and a debt-to-equity ratio of 1.08 . nanostring technologies last announced its quarterly earnings data on thursday , november 2nd . the biotechnology company reported earnings per share for the quarter , topping the consensus estimate of by $ 0.11 . nanostring technologies had a negative return on equity of 174.55 % and a negative net margin of 44.24 % . the company had revenue of $ 27.02 million for the quarter , compared to analysts ' expectations of $ 26.27 million .

during the same quarter in the prior year , the firm earned earnings per share . nanostring technologies 's revenue was up 12.9 % compared to the same quarter last year . analysts expect that nanostring technologies will post -1.77 eps for the current year . hedge funds and other institutional investors have recently made changes to their positions in the business . sg americas securities llc bought a new stake in nanostring technologies during the 3rd quarter valued at $ 124,000 . bank of montreal can boosted its position in nanostring technologies by 3,731.4 % during the 2nd quarter .

bank of montreal can now owns 9,387 shares of the biotechnology company 's stock valued at $ 156,000 after acquiring an additional 9,142 shares in the last quarter . trexquant investment lp bought a new stake in nanostring technologies during the 3rd quarter valued at $ 203,000 . dynamic technology lab private ltd bought a new stake in nanostring technologies during the 3rd quarter valued at $ 222,000 . finally , bank of america corp de boosted its position in nanostring technologies by 16.6 % during the 1st quarter . bank of america corp de now owns 11,404 shares of the biotechnology company 's stock valued at $ 227,000 after acquiring an additional 1,627 shares in the last quarter .
